info.title: Business Partner Outbound Replication
info.description: This API replicates business partners from SAP Sales and Service Cloud Version 2 to SAP S/4HANA.

servers.description: Example of server url is https://my1234567.crm.cloud.sap

BusinessPartnerOutboundReplicationcreate.title: Business Partner Outbound Replication create request

x-sap-shortText: Manage entities from Business Partner Outbound Replication service.

x-sap-extensible.description: You can create extension fields in the Business Partner Outbound Replication API by following the steps mentioned in https://help.sap.com/docs/CX_NG_SVC/2c87cece32844c91836e535aef8f9642/d3bdfac0c6b141c0bac27408c3ed159f.html?locale=en-US. The newly created extensions will be available in the API request and response body.
